paragraphs.heading: Drop-In
paragraphs.content:
Graih's Drop-In is at the very heart of what the Charity does. The Drop-In is open six days a week and seven nights a week - if you are not sure where we are, our address and a map on where to find us can be found in 'Contact us' page at the top. 

At the Drop-in you can have a hot meal, cup of coffee, a hot shower and clothing if needed. As well as all of this, we have staff and volunteers on hand to chat and listen around the diningroom table as well as being on hand to help keep a calm and relaxed atmosphere 

Any alcohol and medications need to be handed in upon arrival, but will be returned once you have finished your visit.

paragraphs.heading: Emergency Night Shelter
paragraphs.content:
The Night Shelter opened at the start of 2019 and has been open every night since. There are always 2 staff on shift at all times who are awake and ready to welcome any one who may turn up for shelter throughout the night. There's no need to phone ahead, you can just turn up! The staff ensure that all are settled and have all they need for the night and ensure the safety of the premises and our guests at all times.

Both men and women 18 years and over are welcome. All medication and alcohol will need to be handed in upon arrival but will be returned when leaving. People can access their medication when needed. 

If you are under the age of 18 years of age and in need of accommodation for the night or find yourself in a homeless situation,  please contact the Duty Social Worker Team.

paragraphs.heading: Support in the Community
paragraphs.content:
We support people out and about in the community, meeting people for coffee and a chat, visiting people in their homes, helping support people to maintain their tennancies and a lot more. 

We visit people in hospital or Mananan court and up at the prison. 

If you know of an individual, or think you yourself may need some support managing your tennancy. If you are at risk of losing your accommodation due to difficulties managing, please give us a call and see if we can offer advice or link in and support you at this time.
